summary: Feature request to implement a 'RawValue' payload wrapper that allows developers to bypass payload converters and send unconverted values directly through the Temporal SDK.
userImpact: Users need a way to prevent automatic payload conversion for specific values when using the Temporal SDK.
proposedFix: Implement a simple payload wrapper that signals converters to skip conversion for wrapped values
resolutionDetails: Feature implemented to support raw value wrapping for non-converted payloads
keyQuote: need a simple payload wrapper that tells converters not to apply conversion
